name: CONTROL'NT
description:
Wadup Gamers!

Do you know those dreams which are totally OUT OF CONTROL and you don't know what's going on? 

Well CONTROL'NT , is a game out of that dream. Shoot random enemies, survive as long as you can.. and Oh, you cannot control where you are going, it's the music that controls you you are OUT OF CONTROL!

How to Play
  • Use mouse to point and shoot
  • Play in full screen! 
  • If u didn't already get it from the menu,Use headphones for best experience
  • When the player gets a blue spotlight around it, it means force field is charged, click the bottom right corner of the player (or if you are not playing full Screen for some reason, then click a little below than the bottom right corner) to perform a force field attack (the mechanics are weird because dreams are weird also it has to be OUT OF CONTROL)
For those who really care:
  • It's not a bug, it's a feature! your gun  sometimes acts like a machine gun and other times a normal pistol, your direction randomly changes, score can be either positive or negative when you kill enemies, things are OUT OF CONTROL, the start screen is the end screen and the end screen is the start screen, well you know something like "the end is the beginning and the beginning is the end"
  • Game made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
Tech used:
  • Unity (for sweet sweet post processing and everything else)
  • Photoshop (for the sprites)
  • FLStudio (for the music)
  • SFXR (for sound effects)
